entry.answer: Karna was a skilled warrior and a key ally of the Kauravas. Despite his valor, he was killed by Arjuna in battle. His fate was ironic because he was actually the eldest Pandava brother, but his low birth and loyalty to Duryodhana led to his tragic death.
